meanings.sent1: The outcome was foreordained, so there was no need to worry.
meanings.sent2: It was foreordained that they would meet at that exact moment.
meanings.sent3: The foreordained meeting between the two old friends brought smiles to their faces.
meanings.sent4: The foreordained path to success was clear in her mind.
meanings.sent5: The foreordained decision to move forward was made with confidence.

meanings.definition: Predetermined by fate or divine will.
meanings.sent1: Their foreordained encounter felt like destiny unfolding before their eyes.
meanings.sent2: The prophecy stated that the chosen one was foreordained to save the kingdom.
meanings.sent3: The foreordained outcome of the game seemed to defy all odds.
meanings.sent4: The foreordained union of the two kingdoms brought peace to the land.
meanings.sent5: The foreordained event left everyone in awe of the power of fate.
